verses.verse: When the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall bring<WH935> you into the land<WH776> where you go<WH935> to possess<WH3423> it<WH5394>, and has cast out many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> you<WH2850>, the Hittites, and the Girgashites<WH1622>, and the Amorites<WH567>, and the Canaanites<WH3669>, and the Perizzites<WH6522>, and the Hivites<WH2340>, and the Jebusites<WH2983>, seven<WH7651> nations<WH1471> greater<WH7227> and mightier than you<WH6099>;

And when the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them before<WH6440> you<WH5221>; you shall strike them<WH2763>, and utterly destroy<WH2763> them<WH3772>; you shall make no covenant<WH1285> with them<WH2603>, nor show mercy unto them:
Neither shall you make marriages<WH2859> with them<WH1323>; your daughter you shall not give<WH5414> unto his son<WH1121>, nor his daughter<WH1323> shall you take<WH3947> unto your son<WH1121>.

For they will turn away<WH5493> your son<WH1121> from following<WH310> me<WH5647>, that they may serve other<WH312> gods<WH430>: so will the anger<WH639> of the Lord<WH3068> be kindled<WH2734> against you<WH8045>, and destroy you suddenly<WH4118>.

But thus shall you deal<WH6213> with them<WH5422>; you shall destroy their altars<WH4196>, and break down<WH7665> their images<WH4676>, and cut down<WH1438> their groves<WH842>, and burn<WH8313> their engraved images<WH6456> with fire<WH784>.

For you are a holy<WH6918> people<WH5971> unto the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>: the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> has chosen<WH977> you to be a special<WH5459> people<WH5971> unto himself<WH5971>, above all people that are upon the face<WH6440> of the earth<WH127>.
The Lord<WH3068> did not set his love<WH2836> upon you<WH977>, nor choose you<WH7230>, because you were more in number than any people<WH5971>; for you were the fewest<WH4592> of all people<WH5971>:

But because the Lord<WH3068> loved<WH160> you<WH8104>, and because he would keep the oath<WH7621> which he had sworn<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>, has the Lord<WH3068> brought you out<WH3318> with a mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and redeemed<WH6299> you out of the house<WH1004> of bondmen<WH5650>, from the hand<WH3027> of Pharaoh<WH6547> king<WH4428> of Egypt<WH4714>.

Know<WH3045> therefore that the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, he is God<WH430>, the faithful<WH539> God<WH410>, which keeps<WH8104> covenant<WH1285> and mercy<WH2617> with them that love<WH157> him and keep<WH8104> his commandments<WH4687> to a thousand<WH505> generations<WH1755>;
And repays<WH7999> them that hate<WH8130> him to their face<WH6440>, to destroy<WH6> them<WH309>: he will not be slack to him that hates<WH8130> him<WH7999>, he will repay him to his face<WH6440>.
You shall therefore keep<WH8104> the commandments<WH4687>, and the statutes<WH2706>, and the judgments<WH4941>, which I command<WH6680> you this day<WH3117>, to do them<WH6213>.

Why it shall come to pass<WH6118>, if you listen<WH8085> to these judgments<WH4941>, and keep<WH8104>, and do<WH6213> them<WH3068>, that the Lord your God<WH430> shall keep<WH8104> unto you the covenant<WH1285> and the mercy<WH2617> which he swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1>:

And he will love<WH157> you<WH1288>, and bless you<WH7235>, and multiply you<WH1288>: he will also bless the fruit<WH6529> of your womb<WH990>, and the fruit<WH6529> of your land<WH127>, your corn<WH1715>, and your wine<WH8492>, and your oil<WH3323>, the increase<WH7698> of your cows<WH504>, and the flocks<WH6251> of your sheep<WH6629>, in the land<WH127> which he swore<WH7650> unto your fathers<WH1> to give you<WH5414>.
You shall be blessed<WH1288> above all people<WH5971>: there shall not be male<WH6135> or female childless<WH6135> among you<WH929>, or among your cattle.

And the Lord<WH3068> will take away<WH5493> from you all sickness<WH2483>, and will put<WH7760> none of the evil<WH7451> diseases<WH4064> of Egypt<WH4714>, which you know<WH3045>, upon you<WH5414>; but will lay them upon all them that hate you<WH8130>.

And you shall consume<WH398> all the people<WH5971> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> you<WH5869>; your eye shall have no pity<WH2347> upon them<WH5647>: neither shall you serve their gods<WH430>; for that will be a snare unto you<WH4170>.
If you shall say<WH559> in your heart<WH3824>, These nations<WH1471> are more<WH7227> than I<WH349>; how can<WH3201> I dispossess them<WH3423>?
You shall not be afraid<WH3372> of them<WH2142>: but shall well remember<WH2142> what the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> did<WH6213> unto Pharaoh<WH6547>, and unto all Egypt<WH4714>;

The great<WH1419> temptations<WH4531> which your eyes<WH5869> saw<WH7200>, and the signs<WH226>, and the wonders<WH4159>, and the mighty<WH2389> hand<WH3027>, and the stretched out<WH5186> arm<WH2220>, by which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> brought you out<WH3318>: so shall the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> do<WH6213> unto all the people<WH5971> of whom you are afraid<WH3373>.
Moreover the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will send<WH7971> the hornet<WH6880> among them<WH7604>, until they that are left, and hide<WH5641> themselves from<WH6440> you<WH6>, be destroyed.
You shall not be afraid<WH6206> at<WH6440> them<WH3068>: for the Lord your God<WH430> is among<WH7130> you<WH1419>, a mighty God<WH410> and terrible<WH3372>.

And the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> will put out<WH5394> those<WH411> nations<WH1471> before<WH6440> you by little<WH4592> and little<WH4592>: you may<WH3201> not consume<WH3615> them at once<WH4118>, lest the animals<WH2416> of the field<WH7704> increase upon you<WH7235>.
But the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> shall deliver<WH5414> them unto you<WH6440>, and shall destroy<WH1949> them with a mighty<WH1419> destruction<WH4103>, until they be destroyed<WH8045>.

And he shall deliver<WH5414> their kings<WH4428> into your hand<WH3027>, and you shall destroy<WH6> their name<WH8034> from under heaven<WH8064>: there shall no man<WH376> be able to stand<WH3320> before<WH6440> you<WH8045>, until you have destroyed them.

The engraved images<WH6456> of their gods<WH430> shall you burn<WH8313> with fire<WH784>: you shall not desire<WH2530> the silver<WH3701> or gold<WH2091> that is on them<WH3947>, nor take it unto you<WH3369>, lest you be snared in it<WH8441>: for it is an abomination to the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>.

Neither shall you bring<WH935> an abomination<WH8441> into your house<WH1004>, lest you be a cursed thing<WH2764> like it<WH8262>: but you shall utterly detest<WH8262> it<WH8581>, and you shall utterly abhor<WH8581> it<WH2764>; for it is a cursed thing.
